definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

pinyin: ping2 shen3 tuan2 te4 bie2 jiang3

sentences.english: Peer review will need to be peer pressure.
sentences.chinese: 同侪评审需要深化为同侪压力。

sentences.english: Chief Economist of China Development Bank, Former Chief of the Energy Evaluation and Review Bureau;
sentences.chinese: 国家开发银行总经济师，原能源评审局局长。

sentences.english: It is great and helps in website review and development.
sentences.chinese: 对于网站评审和开发都是非常有帮助的。

sentences.english: Yanzhou Mining Group Vice President Zhang Minglin chair will be assessed.
sentences.chinese: 兖矿集团副总经理张鸣林主持评审会。

sentences.english: Substandard products in the warehouse shall be sent to and handled by the material assessment division as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 及时将仓库内不合格品交物料评审组评审处理。

sentences.english: Substandard products in the warehouse shall be sent to and handled by the material assessment division as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 及时将仓库内不合格品交物料评审组评审处理。

sentences.english: We will create a mechanism for evaluating key expenditure items before including them in the budget.
sentences.chinese: 构建重大项目支出预算事前评审机制。

sentences.english: Another type of review is the phase and milestone review.
sentences.chinese: 另一类型的评审是阶段和里程碑评审。

sentences.english: Another type of review is the phase and milestone review.
sentences.chinese: 另一类型的评审是阶段和里程碑评审。

sentences.english: The elder judge finally decided that either Sara or May would get the position.
sentences.chinese: 年长的评审官最后决定当选者要么是萨拉，要么是梅。

sentences.english: This paper has already passed the Siyang county government's appraisal, and has obtained the high praise.
sentences.chinese: 课题已经通过了泗阳县政府的评审，并获得了好评。

sentences.english: Nonconformance to design requirements will require a review by Engineering department personnel.
sentences.chinese: 设计要求方面的不合格物项，由工程部人员评审。

sentences.english: Review process documentation and products of the existing test process and tool use.
sentences.chinese: 评审已存在测试过程和工具使用的过程文献以及产品。

sentences.english: Participate to the analysis, definition, and review of the ECRs.
sentences.chinese: 参与分析，定义和评审软件设计。

sentences.english: There are to be 11 members on the judging committee.
sentences.chinese: 全部参赛作品由11人评审委员会评判。

definition: evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
to examine sth and make a decision/to screen/to evaluate/to approve
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
to review a judicial case/to reexamine
